name: Appity Slap
tag_list: technology, web-apps, tech-tools, cloud-computing, internet, tech, small-business, entrepreneur, web-2-0
overview:
Appity Slap: A Small Business Guide to Web Apps, Tech Tools and Cloud Computing

Appity Slap is a must have for any business, large or small. From Blogs and Twitter to Wikis and Webinars. This book will help you to work smarter, faster and cheaper, allowing your business to grow like mad with a lot less effort!

There are hundreds of tools, tips and resources organized by category and indexed by name. Each Web App discussed includes an overview, key features, benefits and pricing.

You donâ€™t know what a webinar is, or what CPC stands for? No worries, the terms and tools are defined and discussed.

This book will help the technically challenged get started on the web and for the tech-savvy, you will discover some new and amazing apps and tools! In addition, there are a ton of marketing and SEO tips, plus startup and small business resources that apply to every business size and type.

The best part isâ€¦many of the tools and resources mentioned are free!
